channel.title: promethemus on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in promethemus on Today I Learned

item.description: Provisioning Grafana Docker docker-compose.yml prometheus: image: prom/prometheus restart: always volumes: - ./prometheus/config.yaml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml command: "--config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml" ports: - "9090:9090" # ui networks: - service grafana: image: grafana/grafana restart: always volumes: - ./grafana/dashboards:/etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/ - ./grafana/datasources:/etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources/ ports: - "3000:3000" # ui networks: - service File structure ./grafana ├── dashboards │ ├── dashboard.yaml │ └── go-processes_rev2.json └── datasources └── datasources.yaml dashboard.yaml apiVersion: 1 providers: # <string> an unique provider name - name: "a unique provider name" # <int> org id.
